text: Hagi Livae nagapima zagamema nehaza vahe'ene, Asapu'ene Hemeni'ene Jedutuni'ene mofavre naga'zmine, naga'zamimo'zanena efeke kukena hu'ne'za nasenasepane hapue nehaza zavenane, Lairie nehaza zavena nehe'za kresrama vu itamofo zage hanati kaziga oti'naze. Ana nehazage'za 120'a pristi vahe'mo'zanena ufena re'naze.
